UnitType.Quote: Air is silent when at peace. Woe to the opponent who hears our wind!
UnitType.Backstory: In the mountains of Urak, the storm giants long have dwelled. But now they walk abroad, carrying the strange construct of their homes with them, to defend those faithful to the mysterious, omnipresent air.

GameModifier.Provides: ::: -99% Unrest in the city this unit is in

UnitType.Quote: Air is silent when at peace. Woe to the opponent who hears our wind!
UnitType.Backstory:
Do they not truly understand my beauty? My scales glimmer as the winds meet them. I am a vision of mighty grace. These armies marching behind me may claim to worship the air and its miracles, but tell me - how then can they be in my presence, yet remain standing and unswooning?
They shall fall to their knees, soon, when they see how I rend my enemies. The many layers of my radiance shall shater their hearts, and awe shall take them. I shall be paid for my might, and upon an opulent pile of riches armies, kings, even Gods, shall gaze upon me and tremble. I am fairest, ancient and lithe and deadly..
